main event: A bright light object hovered over Mather AFB, California, and displayed several abrupt movements.
interesting points: The object appeared circular and approximately 1.5 times the size of a full moon.,Witnesses included both military and civilian personnel.,The object was silver and metallic and emitted a greenish glow.,The flashing object apparently had no definite body but seemed to have a fuselage when seen through haze.,The object was observed for approximately 15-20 minutes before moving at high speed.
sighted object: a bright, circular, metallic object emitting a glow
